item.title: Hugo
item.description: I’ve migrated this site to Hugo so I can host it on Github pages1. Hugo is a fast and well thought-out static site generator, written in Golang. It’s easy to learn and has some neat features2 - the trickiest part is understanding the difference between various ways pages are organised: “sections”, “types”, “taxonomies” etc. The Vim plugin vim-markdown provides good support for authoring Hugo posts since it supports syntax-highlighting for:
